events.title: Jacob Collier World Tour
events.description: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart.

events.title: Ballroom Evening
events.description: I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

events.title: Cory Henry Live
events.description: I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

events.title: Rhetoric Mastery Seminar
events.description: When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary.

events.title: Democracy and the Age of Big Data and AI
events.description: I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.
